text: Not sure if anyone else is still playing. But have you noticed pokemon “hoards” showing up recently? Today and yesterday I came into an area where 6-8 dif pokemon straight up appeared at once. And I feel like I’ve been catching more rare pokemon lately, like a Likitung and a Seel. Have they been making the game easier?
yeah, heard they made it easier to take down gyms by yourself now
damn maybe I should pick it back up
yeah and it’s so rare for me to see a yellow gym, let alone one I even have a shot at joining
tons more bonus point features for first catch of the day, first pokestop of the day, and streaks now too <@U02613K0X>
whoa first catch of the day
